data.name: The Chronicles of Confucius's Journey
data.detailed_description:
Dissatisfied with politics and seeking answers, a man named Confucius sets out on a great journey to learn more about the world around him and spread his philosophy throughout the world. In this Match3 game you can step into his shoes and learn more about Confucius, whose teachings live on to this very day.

- A historical story told in a simple, accessible format
- 20 steps that will take you through the life of Confucius
- 5 chapters as Confucius travels from place to place
- 74 exciting match-3 levels
- Over 90 quotes from Confucius

In this Match3 game you can step into his shoes and learn more about the man, whose teachings live on to today.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz CPU or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
